edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class UserDBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.UserDBConnection

  • public class UserDBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class UserDBConnection -- a customized interface to encapsulate single-user interface to data storage.

        public boolean recordDeclineHit(java.lang.String msgId,
                       java.lang.String studyId,
                       java.lang.String inviteeId,
                       java.lang.String surveryId)
        Records the details about a user who has declined taking the survey.
        Parameters:
        msgId - The Id in the URL which is used to access the system.
        studyId - Study space name which the user is declining.
        inviteeId - The Id of user.
        surveryId - Survey name which the user is declining.
        Returns:
        boolean If the operation of recording was successful or not.
